DOC.brief_summary: A prospective design that studies the effects of a new technique for the treatment of pincer nails. The technique consists of a flattening of the bone of the distal phalanx with a frontal skin lifting that is performed in patients with a pincer nail deformity. Visual Analog Scale (VAS) will be measure before surgery, one month and one year after surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Reconstructive Surgical Approach for Pincer Nail
DOC.criteria: Eligibility Criteria: Pincer nail deformity At least 5 years of pain in the nail Prior unsuccessful conservative treatments Medical or mental conditions that contraindicate surgical treatment of the condition.
